title: Katrina Pierson Arrested for Shoplifting, Illegally Collected Unemployment?
subtitle: Donald Trump campaign spokeswoman Katrina Pierson has been described as a "shoplifting welfare cheat."  Is that an accurate characterization?
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Donald Trump campaign spokeswoman Katrina Pierson was arrested for shoplifting and continued to collect unemployment benefits while working.
